titleStmt.title: A new pocket companion for Oxford, or, Guide through the University [microform] : containing an accurate description of the public edifices, the buildings in each of the colleges, the gardens, statues, pictures, hieroglyphics and all other curiosities in the University : with an historical account of the foundation of the several colleges, and their present state : to which is added, descriptions of the buildings, tapestry, paintings, sculptures, temples, gardens, &c. at Blenheim, Ditchley, Heythrop, Nuneham, and Stow, the seats of His Grace the Duke of Marlborough, the Right Honourable the Earls of Litchfield, Shrewsbury, Harcourt and Temple.

publicationStmt.authority: Leopoldo Cicognara Program (University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign)

monogr.title: A new pocket companion for Oxford, or, Guide through the University [microform] : containing an accurate description of the public edifices, the buildings in each of the colleges, the gardens, statues, pictures, hieroglyphics and all other curiosities in the University : with an historical account of the foundation of the several colleges, and their present state : to which is added, descriptions of the buildings, tapestry, paintings, sculptures, temples, gardens, &c. at Blenheim, Ditchley, Heythrop, Nuneham, and Stow, the seats of His Grace the Duke of Marlborough, the Right Honourable the Earls of Litchfield, Shrewsbury, Harcourt and Temple.

imprint.publisher: Oxford : Printed for D. Prince, and J. Cooke ... and sold by J.F. and C. Rivington

keywords.term: University of Oxford -- Guidebooks -- Early works to 1800.
